name: Max Capacity
description:
Max Capacity is a challenging and rewarding game that will test your skills as a factory mogul. You will need to build and manage the most efficient factory possible. You must hire and train employees, purchase machinery, and configure production lines to produce goods as quickly and cheaply as possible. The market for your goods is constantly changing, so you need to be constantly innovating and adapting your strategies to stay ahead of the competition. And watch your employees closely--they might not see their job as so important.

In single-player mode, you can compete against other players on the Steam leaderboards to see who can make the most money. In multiplayer mode, you can work together with other players to complete contracts and earn even more money.

Here are some of the things that make Max Capacity an exciting game to play:
  • Challenge of building and managing an efficient factory.
  • Ever-changing market conditions that keep you on your toes.
  • Opportunity to compete against other players on the Steam leaderboards.
  • Teamwork and cooperation required in multiplayer mode.
  • Accomplishment when you successfully complete a contract or achieve a goal.

If you're looking for a factory simulation game that is both challenging and rewarding, then start playing Max Capacity today!
